name: Wildlights
description:
An isometric adventure game. 

ENJOY !

PC game - feel free to play on keyboard or with controller

KEYBOARD

       Move - WASD or Arrowkeys

       Dash - C

       Swish - X

       Pause - P

       Confirm - Space or Enter

CONTROLLER/ Gamepad

       Move - Leftstick

       Dash - Button West

       Swish - Button South

       Pause - Start

       Confirm - Button South

Made at the Portland Indie Game Squad – Summer Slow Jam #3 of 2021 with the themes of "Cliffhanger" and "This isn't even my final form" :)

TEAM

Tue - GAME DIRECTOR & CHARACTER DESIGN

JamKat - PROGRAMMER, ADDITIONAL LEVEL DESIGN

CoolOtter - CONCEPT & ENVIRONMENT ART
